channel.title: This Is Now a Whiskey Podcast
channel.description: Long format interviews of people in the tech community where we dive deep into their career paths, what they do day to day, and try to show that there are so many different career paths for IT.
channel.copyright: 2021-2022 This Is Now a Whiskey Podcast

image.title: This Is Now a Whiskey Podcast

channel.itunes:subtitle: Long format interviews of people in the tech community where we dive deep into their career paths, what they do day to day, and try to show that there are so many different career paths for IT.
channel.itunes:author: Wes Kennedy
channel.itunes:summary: Long format interviews of people in the tech community where we dive deep into their career paths, what they do day to day, and try to show that there are so many different career paths for IT.

item.title: #000 - Chandler Bassett - Product Overlay
item.description: Tonight we interview Chandler Bassett, who is a Product Overlay for Pure Storage. We dive into his career path leading to where he is today, including his time in the military.
item.itunes:author: Wes Kennedy
item.itunes:subtitle: This Is Now a Whiskey Podcast: #000 - Chandler Bassett - Product Overlay
item.itunes:summary: Chandler Bassett is a Product Overlay for Pure Storage. He also runs a whiskey education company in New England. We do a deep dive into his career, the path he took to get to where he is today, and a number of other topics.
